programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ;-o dcblock2.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2
instr 1 ;add DC to "beats.wav"
asig soundin "beats.wav" asig = asig+5000 ;adds DC of 5000 outs asig, asig endin
instr 2 ;dcblock audio
asig soundin "beats.wav" asig = asig+5000 ;adds DC adc dcblock2 asig ;remove DC again outs adc, adc
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 i 2 2 2 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
